verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump and members of his cabinet] [V: dug] [ARG1: their heels] [ARGM-DIR: in] [ARGM-LOC: amid a growing outcry over his policy of separating families at the border] .
President Trump and members of his cabinet dug their heels in amid a [V: growing] [ARG1: outcry] over his policy of separating families at the border .
